Header: Elders at Udupila Home Treated to Lunch & Refreshments
Content: Western province-based 8 Sri Lanka Light Infantry (SLLI) troops of the 141 Brigade under the 14 Division of the Security Force Headquarters-West as one more of their routine community projects, visited the YMBA-managed Elders' Home at Udupila, Kelaniya on Monday (29) and attended to the timely needs of those inmates. At first, troops cleaned up the surroundings and bathed all the inmates after shaving them thoroughly and cutting their hair with the support given by members of the staff. Afterwards, all of them were provided with refreshments and a hearty lunch. Commanding Officer, Senior Officers and Other Ranks took part in the social service project.
